ai-patthana12.16:0.2_0: At the place where the nature of the Dhamma is used, unqualified,
ai-patthana12.16:0.3_0: Talking for giving birth, perfumes, and clothes,
ai-patthana12.16:1.1_1: ... five objects have the same object,
ai-patthana12.16:1.1_3: the five hindrances are not clear.
ai-patthana12.16:3.1_0: or go for refuge to the teaching.
ai-patthana12.16:4.1_0: the teaching is not for refuge,
ai-patthana12.16:4.1_1: ... five objects have the same object,
ai-patthana12.16:4.1_3: the five hindrances are not clear.
ai-patthana12.16:5.1_0: (They are) not associated with the teaching.
ai-patthana12.16:5.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana12.16:6.1_0: He doesn’t have moved to the teaching.
ai-patthana12.16:7.1_0: not for refuge, nor for teaching,
ai-patthana12.16:7.1_1: ... five objects have the same object,
ai-patthana12.16:7.1_3: the five hindrances are not clear.
ai-patthana12.16:8.1_0: not for refuge, nor for teaching,
ai-patthana12.16:9.1_0: They don’t go for refuge to or to the teaching. They’re not due to previous lives. ...”
ai-patthana12.16:9.1_1: They don’t go for refuge to the teaching, or the teaching.
ai-patthana12.16:10.1_0: They don’t go for refuge to the teaching.
ai-patthana12.16:11.1_0: They don’t give rise to the pollutants.
ai-patthana12.16:11.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
